rooms.description: A spacious entrance with Vastu-compliant North facing door for positive energy flow.
Connected to the courtyard; designed as a central gathering space aligned with Eastern and Northern orientations.

Southwest positioned for restful energy; includes ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet.

Dedicated servant's quarters integrated within the villa design to maintain privacy and functionality.
